Detailed Description

template<class T>
class Wrapper< T >

Author:
Simon Wicks copying out from Joshi 'C++ Design Patterns and Derivatives Pricing' A wrapper class to enable easy construction and assignment of new objects, but without worrying about deleting them when they go out of scope Any classes to be in the 'wrapper' must implement the 'clone' function
